Class LocationGpsListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • usp.ime.gclib.sensor.location.LocationGpsListener

  • public class LocationGpsListener
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a location listener to the GPS

    1.0
    Author:
    Renato Avila e Tonny Cordeiro

                         int minDist)
        Enable location service with GPS provider
        Parameters:
        context -
        timeWait - minimum time interval between location updates, in milliseconds
        minDist - minimum distance between location updates, in meters

                       Location currentBestLocation,
                       int limitPeriodInMiliseconds)
        Source code modified basing in the Android's documentation Determines whether one Location reading is better than the current Location fix
        Parameters:
        location - The new Location that you want to evaluate
        currentBestLocation - The current Location fix, to which you want to compare the new one
